resources:
RAT-PEDIA Easy use, easy access
User> History Feedback Settings
Welcome Instruction Result Edit Image
Camera Album Confirm Enter Next Cancel
How to use? 1. Choose the photo containing a test box you would like to know about further.\n2. You have two ways of uploading your photo: camera or album.\n3. The application will automatically detect the test box inside the image.\n4. If display image is not appropriately cropped, please cancel and manually crop it.\n5. If it has been automatically and correctly cropped, please click confirm.\n6. The result page will give you precise and detailed information of the test box.
Therapeutic Goods Administration positive percent agreement https://www.tga.gov.au/products/covid-19/covid-19-tests/covid-19-rapid-antigen-self-tests-home-use/covid-19-rapid-antigen-self-tests-are-approved-australia
